TITLE: Basic MaskedView implementation in React Native
DESCRIPTION: Example React Native component showing how to use MaskedView with text as the mask and multiple colored views behind it to create a gradient-like effect through the mask.
SOURCE: https://github.com/react-native-masked-view/masked-view/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: jsx
CODE:
```
import React from 'react';
import { Text, View } from 'react-native';
import MaskedView from '@react-native-masked-view/masked-view';

const App = () => {
  return (
    <MaskedView
      style={{ flex: 1, flexDirection: 'row', height: '100%' }}
      maskElement={
        <View
          style={{
            // Transparent background because mask is based off alpha channel.
            backgroundColor: 'transparent',
            flex: 1,
            justifyContent: 'center',
            alignItems: 'center',
          }}
        >
          <Text
            style={{
              fontSize: 60,
              color: 'black',
              fontWeight: 'bold',
            }}
          >
            Basic Mask
          </Text>
        </View>
      }
    >
      {/* Shows behind the mask, you can put anything here, such as an image */}
      <View style={{ flex: 1, height: '100%', backgroundColor: '#324376' }} />
      <View style={{ flex: 1, height: '100%', backgroundColor: '#F5DD90' }} />
      <View style={{ flex: 1, height: '100%', backgroundColor: '#F76C5E' }} />
      <View style={{ flex: 1, height: '100%', backgroundColor: '#e1e1e1' }} />
    </MaskedView>
  );
}

export default App
```

TITLE: Installing MaskedView package with npm
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the @react-native-masked-view/masked-view package using npm package manager.
SOURCE: https://github.com/react-native-masked-view/masked-view/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
npm install --save @react-native-masked-view/masked-view
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing MaskedView package with yarn
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the @react-native-masked-view/masked-view package using yarn package manager.
SOURCE: https://github.com/react-native-masked-view/masked-view/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
yarn add @react-native-masked-view/masked-view
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing CocoaPods dependencies
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the required iOS CocoaPods dependencies after adding the package to your project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/react-native-masked-view/masked-view/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
npx pod-install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing web dependencies for MaskedView
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the additional modern-screenshot package required for MaskedView web usage.
SOURCE: https://github.com/react-native-masked-view/masked-view/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
yarn add modern-screenshot
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Linking MaskedView package for React Native < 0.60
DESCRIPTION: Command to manually link the native parts of the MaskedView library for projects using React Native versions below 0.60.
SOURCE: https://github.com/react-native-masked-view/masked-view/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
react-native link @react-native-masked-view/masked-view
```
